text: Create a backup of the Vault Backup —< Includes necessary data for restoration Restore the Vault from a backup Restore -< /- Ensures environment recovery /- Validation =—————— Validate integrity of restored data PADR.exe in CyberArk \ Maintain logs of all operations Logs —< Crucial for auditing and understanding recovery actions Use with caution Notes { Follow CyberArk's best practices Regularly test disaster recovery procedures
